common.notfoundMessage: The requested resource could not be found. Please check your link and try again.
common.connectivityIssue: Failed to contact server. Please check your internet connection.
common.rateLimitExceeded: Activity limit exceeded. Please try again later.
common.checkInput: Please check your input in this field.
common.massActionSucceeded: The action has been executed successfully.
common.massActionFailed: Failed to execute the action. Please try again later.
common.sustainingMemberThanks: You're a Sustaining Member - thanks so much for supporting us and keeping this project alive!
common.confirmMassDeleteText: Do you really want to delete the selected item?
common.confirmMassDeleteText_plural: Do you really want to delete the {{count}} selected items?

login.signupLink: Don't have an account? Sign up
login.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your email address and password.
login.bannedError: Your account has been deactivated. Please contact our support team if you have questions.
login.notActivatedError: Your account has not been activated yet. Please click the activation link in the activation email sent to you during signup.
login.lostPasswordDone: We've sent an email to you containing instructions to reset your password.
login.lostPasswordFailed: We could not reset your password. Please check your email address and try again.
login.passwordResetDone: Your password has been changed successfully. You can now log in with your new password.
login.passwordResetFailed: Sorry, we could not change your password. A possible reason is that your password reset link has expired. Please try again.
login.forgotPasswordText: Forgot your password? No problem. Just enter your email address and we will send you instructions on how to reset your password.
login.resetPasswordText: Please specify a new password for your account and confirm it, then click "Reset password".
login.mfaText: Please enter a current MFA code from a device linked to your account.

signup.signupText: Don't have an account yet? Sign up for free, it only takes a minute.
signup.recaptchaError: Sorry, we couldn't verify your registration. If you think this is an error, please contact our support team.
signup.signupError: An error occured while creating your account. Please try again later.
signup.signupConflict: There is already an account with this email address. Please use another email address or sign in to your existing account.
signup.signupSuccess: Your account has been created successfully. We have sent a confirmation email to your email address. Please follow the instructions in the confirmation email in order to activate your account.
signup.confirmError: Sorry, we couldn't confirm your account. Either the confirmation link is invalid, your account is already activated or the confirmation link has expired. If you think this is an error, please contact our support team.
signup.confirmSuccess: Your account has been confirmed successfully. You can now proceed and sign in to your new account.
signup.acceptToS: I agree to the Terms of Service
signup.acceptPrivacy: I agree to the Privacy Policy

dashboard.donateText: Your donation helps us to keep {{serviceName}} free of charge and free of advertisements. {{serviceName}} is a non-profit project and all donations will be used for development and server expenses. Thank you for your support!
dashboard.newsletterText: Don't miss out on the latest news and announcements from {{serviceName}}! Just subscribe for our free newsletter. The newsletter will be used exlusively for news and announcements regarding {{serviceName}}.
dashboard.failedToSaveNewsletter: Sorry, we couldn't save your decision at this time. Please try again later.
dashboard.newsletterSaved: Thanks, your newsletter preference has been saved.
dashboard.sustainingMembershipText: Do you find {{serviceName}} useful and want to support us and at the same time benefit from exclusive membership rewards? Become a Sustaining Member now! Your Sustaining Membership helps us to cover infrastructure costs and ensures our service can operate and scale reliably, stay ad-free and is constantly improved.

bounceWarning.title: We couldn't reach you...
bounceWarning.text: Our last attempts to send notifications to the email address specified in your profile failed, so we refrain from attempting to send any more notifications to you for now. Please ensure your email address is up to date and change it, if necessary. You can also re-enable notifications here. Please note that we might disable them again in case our emails keep on bouncing back.
bounceWarning.reenableFailed: We couldn't re-enable your notifications right now. Please try again later.

jobs.title: Title

notifyOn.onSuccess: execution of the cronjob succeeds after it failed before
notifyOn.onDisable: the cronjob will be disabled because of too many failures

schedule.noExecutionsWarning: No executions determined. Please ensure you have selected at least one item in every field.

jobs.crontabExpressionCopyFailed: Failed to copy crontab expresison to clipboard.
jobs.failedToSave: Failed to save cronjob. Please try again later.
jobs.failedToDelete: Failed to delete the cronjob. Please try again later.
jobs.confirmDeleteJob: Do you really want to delete this cronjob? This action cannot be undone.
jobs.failedToClone: Failed to clone the cronjob. Please try again later.
jobs.cloned: The cronjob has been cloned successfully. Please enable the job to start executions.
jobs.invalidUrl: This URL does not look to be valid.
jobs.invalidTimeout: The timeout value is invalid. The maximum timeout is {{maxRequestTimeout}} seconds.
jobs.failedToCreate: Failed to create cronjob. Please try again later.
jobs.created: The cronjob has been created successfully.
jobs.cantDeleteMonitorJob: This job is used for a status monitor and therefore cannot be deleted. Please remove the associated status monitor(s) first and try again.

testRun.startQuestion: Do you want to start a test run for your current job settings, including any unsaved changes? We will execute your request immediately and display the results.
testRun.ipNote: When executing the test run, we will forward your IP address to the destination server in the X-Forwarded-For HTTP header.
testRun.recaptchaError: Sorry, we couldn't verify your test run request. If you think this is an error, please contact our support team.
testRun.storeError: Sorry, we couldn't submit your test run request. Please try again later.
testRun.pollError: Sorry, we couldn't process your test run request at this time. Please try again later.

redirectNote.title: Redirection detected
redirectNote.text: It looks like your URL redirects to another URL. {{serviceName}} does not automatically follow redirections. In most cases, updating the job URL to the redirection target resolves this issue.

jobs.redirectSuccess: Treat redirects with HTTP 3xx status code as success

folders.noFolders: You do not currently have any folders.
folders.title: Title
folders.createFailed: Failed to create folder. Please try again later.
folders.titleConflict: A folder with this name already exists.
folders.confirmDeleteFolder: Do you really want to delete this folder? Any jobs which exist in this folder will be moved to the root folder.
folders.folderDeleteFailed: Failed to delete folder. Please try again later.

statuspages.title: Title
statuspages.pageCreated: Status page created. You can now add status monitors and publish your page.
statuspages.pageCreateFailed: Failed to create status page. Please try again later.
statuspages.noMonitors: This status page does not have status monitors yet. Get started by clicking "Add Status Monitor".
statuspages.checkUptimeThresholdInput: Availability thresholds have to be a number between 0 and 100.
statuspages.checkLatencyThresholdInput: Latency thresholds have to be a number between 0 and 30,000.
statuspages.monitorUpdateFailed: Failed to update the status monitor. Please check your input and try again later.
statuspages.confirmDeleteMonitor: Do you really want to delete this status monitor? This action cannot be undone.
statuspages.monitorUpdated: The status monitor has been updated successfully.
statuspages.monitorDeleteFailed: Failed to delete status monitor. Please try again later.
statuspages.monitorDeleted: The status monitor has been deleted successfully.
statuspages.createMonitorText: Please select the cronjob you want to base your status monitor on. We recommend to use minutely jobs for best results. You can also specify the title that should be used to display the monitor on your status page.
statuspages.monitorModeNote: Using a cronjob in a status monitor will swtich the cronjob to monitor mode. In monitor mode, job failures will be ignored and not cause the job to be disabled.
statuspages.monitorCreateFailed: Failed to create the status monitor. Please try again later.
statuspages.monitorCreated: The status monitor has been created successfully. You can customize it now by editing it.
statuspages.logoTooBig: The selected file exceeds the logo size limit of {{limit}} KB.
statuspages.failedToLoadLogo: Failed to load the logo file.
statuspages.noLogo: No logo added yet. Click "Add Logo" to add a custom logo to your status page.
statuspages.customDomainHelp: In order to use a custom domain for your status page, you need to own the specified domain and set up a CNAME DNS record to {{cnameDomain}}.
statuspages.statusPageUpdated: The status page has been updated successfully.
statuspages.statusPageUpdateFailed: Failed to update the status page. Please try again later.
statuspages.confirmDeleteDomain: Do you really want to delete this domain? Your status page will not be reachable from this domain anymore.
statuspages.domainDeleteFailed: Failed to delete the domain. Please try again later.
statuspages.domainDeleted: The domain has been deleted successfully.
statuspages.addDomainText: Please enter the (sub) domain name you would like to use for your status page.
statuspages.domainCreateFailedConflict: Failed to add the domain. It might already be in use by another status page. Please check your input and try again.
statuspages.domainCreateFailed: Failed to add the domain. Please try again later.
statuspages.domainCreated: The domain has been added successfully.
statuspages.monitorOrderUpdateFailed: Failed to update order of status monitors. Please try again later.
statuspages.confirmDeleteStatusPage: Do you really want to delete this status page? This action cannot be undone.
statuspages.cannotDeletePublishedPage: Published status pages cannot be deleted. Please unpublish your status page first.
statuspages.statusPageDeleteFailed: Failed to delete the status page. Please try again later.
statuspages.statusPageDeleted: The status page has been deleted successfully.

settings.timezoneNote: The default timezone only applies to new jobs. You can edit the timezone of existing jobs individually in the job editor.
settings.saveFailed: Failed to save settings. Please try again later.
settings.invalidPassword: Passwords must have at least 8 characters.
settings.failedToChangePassword: Failed to change password. Please try again later.
settings.wrongPasswordError: The current password you have entered is invalid. Please try again.
settings.passwordChanged: Your password has been changed successfully.
settings.changeEmailAddressNote: After saving, we will send a confirmation email to your new email address. The email address change will be effective as soon as you confirm it using the link in the vertification email.
settings.failedToChangeEmail: Failed to change email address. Please try again later.
settings.emailAddressInUse: The new email address you have entered is already in use.
settings.emailChanged: We've sent a confirmation email to your new email address. Please follow the instructions to confirm your new email address.
settings.deleteAccountActiveSubscription: You have an active subscription. Please cancel your subscription before deleting your account.
settings.deleteAccountNote: Are you sure you want to delete your account? All associated data including all cronjobs will be deleted permanently. This cannot be undone. In case you want to delete, please confirm by entering your account's email address.
settings.deleteAccountTypeEmailAddress: Confirm by entering your account's email address
settings.failedToDeleteAccount: Your account could not be deleted. Please try again. If in doubt, please contact our support team.
settings.accountDeleted: Your account has been deleted successfully.
settings.subscriptionActive: You're an active sustaining member - thanks so much for supporting {{serviceName}}!
settings.subscriptionPending: We're currently processing your order - please check back soon!
settings.subscriptionInactive: You're not currently an active sustaining member.
settings.subscriptionExpiring: Your sustaining membership is expiring at {{expiresAt}}.
settings.sustainingMemberTeaser: Do you find {{serviceName}} useful and want to support us and at the same time benefit from exclusive membership rewards? Become a Sustaining Member now!
settings.manageSubscriptionFailed: Failed to load subscription management portal. Please try again later or contact our support team.

subscribeDialog.text1: By becoming a Sustaining Member of {{serviceName}}, you're helping us to fund ongoing operation and improvement of our service.
subscribeDialog.text2: As a thank-you, we can provide exclusive benefits to users holding Sustaining Member status.
subscribeDialog.text3: You can chose yourself between different available monthly or yearly fees, depending on the amount you want to support us with. Memberships can be cancelled on a monthly or yearly basis, depending on the payment interval you have chosen.
subscribeDialog.maxFailures: Max failures before disabling a job
subscribeDialog.subscriptionPrices:
5, 10 or 20 EUR a month 
or 12, 24 or 36 EUR a year (at your choice)
subscribeDialog.vatNote: All prices include statutory VAT, if applicable (depending on your location). More details will be shown during the checkout process before placing the order.
subscribeDialog.orderText: Thanks for supporting us! You can now chose the amount you would like to pay per month and proceed to checkout.
subscribeDialog.acceptRefundPolicy: I agree to the Refund Policy

settings.orderFailed: Failed to load checkout portal. Please try again later or contact our support team.

mfa.noDevices: No devices found. Add a MFA device now to secure your account.
mfa.title: Title
mfa.selectType: Please select the type of device you want to add, specify a title for easier identification and authenticate using your account password to continue.

totpDevice.title: Authenticator app (TOTP)
totpDevice.description: Use an authenticator app like Google Authenticator or Microsoft Authenticator.
totpDevice.pairInstructions: Please use your authenticator app to scan the pairing QR code and enter an authentication code below to finish the pairing process.

yubicoOtpDevice.title: YubiKey (Yubico OTP)
yubicoOtpDevice.enterCode: Generate an OTP using your YubiKey

mfa.createError: Failed to create the MFA device. Please try again later.
mfa.confirmError: Failed to confirm your MFA device. Please double-check your input.
mfa.created: The MFA device has been added successfully.
mfa.confirmDelete: Do you really want to delete this MFA device? You won't be able to use it for authentication anymore. Please note that multi-factor authentication will be disabled for your account in case you delete all linked MFA devices. In case you want to proceed, please enter your account password.
mfa.deleted: The MFA device has been deleted successfully.
mfa.deleteError: Sorry, we could not delete the MFA device. Please try again later.

apiKeys.title: Title
apiKeys.ipLimitHelp: Separate multiple addresses with comma. Leave empty to disable IP restriction.
apiKeys.noKeys: You don't have any API keys yet.
apiKeys.showKeyDialogText: Please authenticate using your account password to view your API key.
apiKeys.showKeyError: Sorry, we could not retrieve your key. Please try again later.
apiKeys.showKeyFindBelow: You can find your API key below:
apiKeys.tokenCopySuccess: Your API key has been copied to clipboard.
apiKeys.tokenCopyError: Failed to copy token to clipboard.
apiKeys.confirmDelete: Do you really want to delete the API key? You won't be able to access the API with this key anymore.
apiKeys.deleteError: Sorry, we could not delete your API key. Please try again later.
apiKeys.deleted: Your API key has been deleted successfully.
apiKeys.addText: For easier identification, please specify a title for your new API key. You can optionally restrict access to certain IP addresses by entering them in the "IP Address Restriction" field. Separate multiple addresses with comma.
apiKeys.createError: Sorry, we could not create the API key. Please try again later.
apiKeys.created: Your API key has been created. Click "Display Key" in order to retrieve your token.
apiKeys.saveError: Sorry, we could not save your changes. Please try again later.
apiKeys.saved: Your changes to the API key have been saved successfully.

statistics.requestFailed: Failed to load statistics. Please try again later.
statistics.executionsAndJitter: Executions per minute and average jitter

confirmEmailChange.success: Your account's email address has been changed successfully. You can now login with your new email address.
confirmEmailChange.error: Sorry, we could not confirm your email address change. The confirmation link is invalid, expired or has already been used.
